item.title: Nestle to cut 16,000 jobs as part of cost savings initiative
item.description: New Nestle CEO Philipp Navratil is implementing a workforce reduction of 16,000 positions to accelerate growth and achieve substantial cost cuts.

item.title: GM takes $1.6B financial hit as EV tax credit changes force strategy overhaul
item.description: GM announced a $1.6 billion third-quarter charge as it revamps its electric vehicle strategy following the end of federal EV tax credits under the Tru...

item.title: ETF race hits $1T at record speed
item.description: Money is flowing into ETFs so fast this year that the industry hit $1 trillion in October, months ahead of last year's pace, as gold, bonds and crypto...

item.title: Goldman's profit beats estimates as dealmaking rebound boosts investment banking
item.description: Goldman Sachs reported a third-quarter profit of $4.1 billion, beating estimates as advisory fees jumped 60% amid a banner year for mergers and acquis...

item.title: JPMorgan lifts interest income forecast after profit beats estimates
item.description: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon says the U.S. economy remains resilient despite geopolitical uncertainty as the bank beats quarterly profit forecasts.
